thread.title: LOL! Mark Steyn explains why he’s REALLY looking forward to Obama’s next book [video]
thread.title_full: LOL! Mark Steyn explains why he’s REALLY looking forward to Obama’s next book [video]

author: Doug P.
title: LOL! Mark Steyn explains why he’s REALLY looking forward to Obama’s next book [video]
text:
Mark Steyn is really looking forward to the former president’s next offering, as evidenced by this high (and hilarious) praise for a previous book: . @MarkSteynOnline ​: "I liked Obama's last book… it was a great work of fiction!" #Obamabookdeal pic.twitter.com/tsEg951JEj 
— Varney & Co. (@Varneyco) March 1, 2017 
Now there’s a rave review! Uh, sort of. @Varneyco @MarkSteynOnline Stuart, PLEASE have Mark on again soon! Loved him!!
